answerText: Okonkwo[10] Okonkwo is the protagonist of this Chinua Achebe novel. Set in Umuofia, its sequel is titled No Longer at Ease.
heading: Michigan Fall Tournament |2013 | Editors Round 8 | 11 | Literature | World | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This character once defeated a man nicknamed "the Cat" in a wrestling match, and he is disappointed when his first harvest attempt ends in failure, rewarding farmers who were too lazy to plant. For 10 points each: [10] Name this character who moves his family into a seven-year exile when his gun accidentally goes off during a funeral. At the end of the book he appears in, the Commissioner buries his corrupted body after he hangs himself.
